title: UNB pays tribute to artificial limb pioneer Bob Scott (UNB - University of New Brunswick) ...
text: ( Source : UNB - University of New Brunswick ) Friends and colleagues paid tribute to Bob Scott , the founder of the Institute of Biomedical Engineering at the University of New Brunswick (UNB), today at R.N. Scott Hall . Dr. Scott , a professor
